Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Fade Off Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from on to off. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Load Type
Value.Help: Specify the type of load that this dimmer controls.
